sense.def:
Kadar oster predmet
scratches someone
, podrgne po koži tistega človeka in jo nekoliko poškoduje.

seg.quote: I got scratched by a rose bush.
His knees were scratched by thorns.

sense.def:
To scratch an object
pomeni po nesreči narediti majhne zareze na nekem predmetu.

Scratches
so majhne zareze ali sledi na osebi ali predmetu.

seg.quote: You're not going to die. It's only a scratch.
White shoe polish can hide scratches on white woodwork.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To scratch a part of one's body
ali
to scratch oneself
pomeni podrgniti z nohti po koži, ker nas srbi.

seg.quote: The cook began scratching the rash on his neck.
We are scratching because we itch.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
is scratching their head
, hočemo reči, da močno razmišlja in poskuša najti rešitev.

To do something from scratch
pomeni, da nekaj naredimo tako, da pri tem ne uporabimo ničesar, kar je bilo narejeno prej.

cit.quote: od začetka, na novo, iz nič

seg.quote: Now we have to start again from scratch.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is not up to scratch
, ni dovolj dobro.

cit.quote: ne biti na višini, biti nezadovoljiv

seg.quote: My Economics isn't likely to be up to scratch.
